 
{{Server function}}
This function will return the time the specified [[/ban.md|ban]] was created, in '''seconds'''.

==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
int getBanTime ( ban theBan )
</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theBan:''' The [[/ban.md|ban]] of which you wish to retrieve the time of.

===Returns===
* Returns an integer of the banning time in the format of seconds from the year 1970.  Use in conjunction with [[/getRealTime.md|getRealTime]] in order to retrieve detailed information.
* Returns '''false''' if invalid arguments were specified or if there was no banning time specified for the [[/ban.md|ban]].

==Example==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function retrieveBan(theBan)
    local ban = getBanTime(theBan)
    if ban then
        outputChatBox("The time of the ban is: " .. ban, root, 255, 255, 255, false)
    end
end
</syntaxhighlight>
